title: Well-Read Lives - In paragraph 2 author suggests

content.question: In Paragraph 2 ("Whatever ... 1870s"), the author suggests that

choices.label: diaries helped girls experiment privately with different personas
girls were punished for voicing rebellious thoughts in their diaries
girls exchanged diaries to communicate with each other confidentially
girls became socially ambitious as a result of diary keeping

content.answer: diaries helped girls experiment privately with different personas

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
